description: Turn off the MSM & clear your head. 6 companies own 90% of the mainstream media - & they hire actors to to relay their 4am talking points (Mockingbird Media). They are all involved in a conspiracy against America, our President & We the People. Get it right.... Every one of these gutter rats involved in these news companies know EXACTLY what they are doing. They are betraying our Country & deserve a traitor’s punishment. ☠️💯
